company_updates.reshared_post_description:
In this episode, we sit down with Maher Loubieh, Co-Founder, CEO, and Board Member of HALA. Hala is one of the leading fintech players in the MENAP region. 

Maher walks us through Halaâ€™s bold pivot from a B2C product, which led to the loss of over 200,000 users, to rebuilding the company from the ground up and now serving more than 130,000 SMEs.

We talk about what it really takes to start over, the lessons behind that pivot, and what Hala is building today: a full-stack financial platform designed to help small businesses start, run, and grow. Equipping them with with tools like digital wallets, smart POS systems, business accounts, and data-driven lending.

Founded in 2017 and licensed by the Saudi Central Bank, Halaâ€™s vision is to become the future bank of SMEs in the region.

Available on: 
-YouTube: https://lnkd.in/dNHuwJtK
-Apple Podcast: https://lnkd.in/dVN3Ta_m
-Spotify: https://lnkd.in/dRkUAWsm

company_updates.reshared_post_description:
In this episode, we sit down with Maher Loubieh, Co-Founder, CEO, and Board Member of HALA. Hala is one of the leading fintech players in the MENAP region. 

Maher walks us through Halaâ€™s bold pivot from a B2C product, which led to the loss of over 200,000 users, to rebuilding the company from the ground up and now serving more than 130,000 SMEs.

We talk about what it really takes to start over, the lessons behind that pivot, and what Hala is building today: a full-stack financial platform designed to help small businesses start, run, and grow. Equipping them with with tools like digital wallets, smart POS systems, business accounts, and data-driven lending.

Founded in 2017 and licensed by the Saudi Central Bank, Halaâ€™s vision is to become the future bank of SMEs in the region.

Season 4 is getting into motion, and Iâ€™m feeling nothing but gratitude ğŸ™. When this podcast first started, it was just a couch, a mic, and a vague idea of the direction of travel. Today, itâ€™s become a platform where some of the sharpest minds in banking, fintech, web3, venture, technology, and beyond come together to decode the future of finance and technology. 

But none of it â€” none â€” would be possible without the incredible companies whoâ€™ve chosen to back this journey from Day 1 (and we are now in our 4th season with over a 130 episodes publised)

ğŸ’¥ To our returning sponsors â€” Adyen Thunes and Mastercard â€” thank you for believing in this platform again. Your continued support means more than you know. 

ğŸ™Œ And to the new partners joining the ride â€” e&, HALA, SC Ventures by Standard Chartered, and Digit9 â€” welcome to the Couchonomics crew. Thrilled to have you onboard as we level up the conversations and expand the ecosystem across the region and beyond.

With a new look studio, a bolder editorial agenda, and some truly iconic guests already lined up, Season 4 is shaping up to be our most ambitious yet.
